name: Mystic Manor
theme: Explore Lord Henry Mystic's supernatural museum where artifacts come to life in this trackless dark ride.
short_description: A cutting-edge trackless dark ride exclusive to Hong Kong with magical artifacts.

name: Big Grizzly Mountain Runaway Mine Cars
theme: Race through a gold mining town on a runaway coaster featuring forward and backward sections.
short_description: A family coaster with reversing segments through a Western mining town.

name: Iron Man Experience
theme: Fly through Hong Kong alongside Iron Man battling Hydra forces in this 3D flight simulator.
short_description: A motion simulator ride featuring Iron Man exclusive to Hong Kong.

name: Ant-Man and The Wasp: Nano Battle!
theme: Shrink down and help Ant-Man and The Wasp battle Hydra's swarmbot army in this interactive shooter.
short_description: An interactive dark ride exclusive to Hong Kong featuring Ant-Man.

name: Hyperspace Mountain
theme: Blast through space in an X-wing fighter battling TIE fighters in this Star Wars indoor coaster.
short_description: An indoor roller coaster through Star Wars space battles.

name: Frozen Ever After
theme: Journey through Arendelle visiting Elsa's ice palace and experiencing Frozen's iconic songs.
short_description: A boat ride through the kingdom of Arendelle with Anna and Elsa.

name: Wandering Oaken's Sliding Sleighs
theme: Slide through the North Mountain on a bobsled coaster with Sven and Kristoff.
short_description: A family bobsled coaster through Frozen's snowy landscape.

name: RC Racer
theme: Race on a giant U-shaped track with RC from Toy Story swinging back and forth.
short_description: A half-pipe shuttle coaster themed to Toy Story's RC car.

name: Slinky Dog Spin
theme: Spin around as Slinky Dog chases his tail in Andy's backyard.
short_description: A spinning flat ride featuring Slinky Dog from Toy Story.

name: Toy Soldier Parachute Drop
theme: Drop from the sky with the Green Army Men in a parachute training mission.
short_description: A gentle drop tower themed to Toy Story's army men.

name: Jungle River Cruise
theme: Navigate through exotic rivers guided by a humorous skipper encountering animatronic animals.
short_description: A classic boat tour through jungle environments with comedy.

name: Festival of the Lion King
theme: A theatrical celebration of The Lion King with acrobatics, puppetry, and live singing.
short_description: A high-energy stage show celebrating The Lion King with performers.

name: Moana: A Homecoming Celebration
theme: Join Moana in a celebration of Polynesian culture with music, dance, and storytelling.
short_description: A live show featuring Moana with Pacific Island performances.

name: it's a small world
theme: A boat cruise celebrating world cultures with singing dolls and the iconic song.
short_description: A gentle boat ride through colorful scenes from around the globe.

name: Fairy Tale Forest
theme: Stroll through an enchanted forest with animated scenes from Disney princess stories.
short_description: A walk-through attraction featuring miniature Disney princess scenes.

name: Mickey's PhilharMagic
theme: A 3D concert film featuring Donald Duck and classic Disney songs with in-theater effects.
short_description: An immersive 3D musical journey through Disney animated classics.

name: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
theme: Journey through the Hundred Acre Wood with Pooh, Tigger, Piglet, and friends.
short_description: A gentle dark ride through Winnie the Pooh's storybook world.

name: Cinderella Carousel
theme: A classic carousel with ornate horses in front of the castle.
short_description: A beautiful carousel featuring hand-carved horses.

name: Dumbo the Flying Elephant
theme: Soar through the sky on flying elephants with altitude control.
short_description: A classic flying elephant spinner ride for all ages.

name: Mad Hatter Tea Cups
theme: Spin in giant teacups at the Mad Hatter's tea party.
short_description: A spinning teacup ride themed to Alice in Wonderland.

name: Buzz Lightyear Astro Blasters
theme: Join Buzz Lightyear's mission to defeat Emperor Zurg with laser shooters.
short_description: An interactive shooting dark ride with competitive scoring.

name: Orbitron
theme: Pilot rocket ships through space controlling your altitude.
short_description: A spinning rocket ride with guest-controlled height.

name: Hong Kong Disneyland Railroad
theme: A scenic steam train ride around the park with stops at multiple lands.
short_description: A grand circle tour aboard authentic steam locomotives.

name: Main Street Vehicles
theme: Ride vintage early-20th-century vehicles down Main Street.
short_description: Historic vehicle transportation along Main Street U.S.A.

name: Momentous
theme: A spectacular nighttime show with fireworks, projections, lasers, and fountains celebrating Disney stories.
short_description: Hong Kong Disneyland's premier nighttime spectacular over the castle.

name: Flights of Fantasy Parade
theme: A whimsical daytime parade featuring Disney characters on flying-themed floats.
short_description: The park's signature daytime parade celebrating flight and fantasy.
